text.section:
The Commission, in accordance with the State budget, may employ:
a general staff; and
an investigative staff to conduct investigations.

While employed by the Commission, an individual may not:
be licensed in any state as a real estate appraiser or home inspector;
engage in any act for which a license is required under this title; or
in connection with any real estate appraisal transaction or home inspection engagement, directly or indirectly receive or become entitled to receive any compensation, fee, or perquisite.
